testcase.name: validate_myAPI

failure.message:
1 expectation failed. Response body doesn't match expectation. Expected: The content to match the given JSON schema. error: instance type (number) does not match any allowed primitive type (allowed: ["string"]) level: "error" schema: {"loadingURI":"#","pointer":"/items/properties/salary"} instance: {"pointer":"/0/salary"} domain: "validation" keyword: "type" found: "number" expected: ["string"]
Actual: [{"id":1,"name":"John Doe","age":30,"department":"HR","salary":50000.00},{"id":2,"name":"Alice Smith","age":35,"department":"Engineering","salary":60000.00},{"id":3,"name":"Bob Johnson","age":28,"department":"Marketing","salary":55000.00},{"id":4,"name":"Emily Brown","age":32,"department":"Sales","salary":52000.00},{"id":5,"name":"Michael Lee","age":40,"department":"Finance","salary":70000.00},{"id":6,"name":"Pat Cummins","age":31,"department":"Cricket","salary":20000.00},{"id":7,"name":"Sunil Narine","age":36,"department":"Cricket","salary":21000.00},{"id":8,"name":"Sunil Mhatre","age":45,"department":"Football","salary":55000.00},{"id":9,"name":"Sunil Kharge","age":48,"department":"Baseball","salary":20000.00},{"id":10,"name":"Marie Curie","age":30,"department":"R&D","salary":35000.00},{"id":11,"name":"Manik Chand","age":30,"department":"Chemist","salary":40000.00},{"id":12,"name":"Danavira","age":30,"department":"Druggist","salary":30000.00},{"id":13,"name":"Manik Chand","age":30,"department":"Chemist","salary":40000.00},{"id":14,"name":"Marie Marie","age":30,"department":"R&D","salary":35000.00},{"id":15,"name":"Manik Manik","age":30,"department":"Chemist","salary":40000.00}]
